# Zoo murder {#sec-denial-zoomurder}

::: {.callout-caution title="Myth"}
Russia was not involved in the murder of Georgian citizen Zelimkhan Khangoshvili in Berlin
[<br></br>![Search for topic in EUvsDisinfo](../all_common_img/EUvsDisinfo_400x240.jpg){height=2em}](https://euvsdisinfo.eu/disinformation-cases/?text=krasikov&sort=relevance)
:::

::: {.callout-tip title="Truth"}
- The Kremlin commissioned the murder. 
- The Kremlin payed Krasikov's lawyer. 
- Russia exchanged multiple people from russian prisons to release the convicted FSB murder Vadim Krasikov.
- Putin hugged Krasikov when he arrived in Moscow.
:::


## 2019 August - Murder

Zelimkhan Khangoshvili was murdered by Vadim Krasikov in Berlin Tiergarten. Krasikkov travelled under false name "Sokolov", see 
[wikipedia: Khangoshvili Assassination](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zelimkhan_Khangoshvili#Assassination)


## 2019 December - Assassin

[Bellingcat](https://www.bellingcat.com/news/uk-and-europe/2019/12/03/identifying-the-berlin-bicycle-assassin-part-1-from-moscow-to-berlin/) identified that Vadim "Sokolov" is in fact the FSB agent Vadim Krasikov.

German Newspaper [Der Spiegel](https://www.spiegel.de/international/world/how-russian-agents-hunt-down-kremlin-opponents-in-europe-a-1300091.html) reports about the secret Russian death squad.
